prompt:
Nurse: That's great, Mr. Gardner. Have you gained more than 2 pounds in the past day or 5 pounds in the past week?

Patient: Hello?

Nurse: Hello, Mr. Gardner. I was asking about your weight. Have you gained more than 2 pounds in the past day or 5 pounds in the past week?

Patient: No.

Nurse: That's good to hear, Mr. Gardner. Lastly, have you been using more pillows at night to sleep?

Patient: No.

Nurse: That's great, Mr. Gardner. We just performed a simple CHF assessment. It's a good idea to keep an eye on these symptoms at home every day. I understand that keeping track of symptoms can be a bit complicated. Do you have any questions about how to do so?

Patient: Hello?

responses.gpt4: Hi, Mr. Gardner. I was asking if you have any questions about how to monitor your symptoms at home?
responses.our_model: Hello, Mr. Gardner. I was asking if you have any questions about monitoring your symptoms at home. [
